          <title>
            <string language="en">Balancing of a see-saw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgleichen eines See-saw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équilibrage d'une balançoir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balançar de um balanço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equilibratura di un'altalena</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εξισορρόπηση βλέπει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El balancear de un balancín</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing movement of a see-saw. This illustration shows that a see-saw can balance when the turning forces (clockwise and anti-clockwise) are equal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anti-clockwise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balance turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clockwise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">see-saw</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
Bewegung eines See-saw zeigen. Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein 
See-saw ausgleichen kann, wenn die drehenkräfte (rechts herum und 
nach links) gleich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations montrant le 
mouvement d'une balançoir. Cette illustration prouve qu'une 
balançoir peut équilibrer quand les forces de rotation (horaires et 
dans le sens contraire des aiguilles d'une montre) sont égales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram o 
movimento de um balanço. Esta ilustração mostra que um 
balanço pode balançar quando as forças de giro (sentido horário e 
anti-horário) são iguais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano movimento di un'altalena. Questa illustrazione indica 
che un'altalena può equilibrare quando le forze di rotazione (in 
senso orario ed in senso antiorario) sono uguali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μετακίνηση 
βλέπει. Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι 
δείτε μπορεί να ισορροπήσει όταν οι γυρίζοντας 
δυνάμεις (δεξιόστροφες και αντίθετες προς την φορά των δεικτών 
του ρολογιού) είναι ίσες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que muestran
el movimiento de un balancín. Esta ilustración muestra que un 
balancín puede balancear cuando las fuerzas que dan vuelta (a la 
derecha y a la izquierda) son iguales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
